Introduction

Kim Dong-young, popularly known as Doyoung, is a South Korean singer and actor under SM Entertainment. He is best known as a member of the boy group NCT and its sub-units NCT U and NCT 127. Before debuting, Doyoung appeared and performed in Disney Channel Korea's The Mickey Mouse Club with fellow SM Rookies.
